meta.description: Consensus algorithms operating on Riemannian manifolds

karcher_mean_consensus.objective: Minimize sum of squared geodesic distances: min_x Sum(d_M(x, y_i)^2)

geometric_median_consensus.objective: Minimize sum of geodesic distances (Robust to outliers): min_x Sum(d_M(x, y_i))
geometric_median_consensus.fault_tolerance: Breakdown point depends on geometry; typically 0.5 for 1D, less for high-dim.

outlier_rejection.logic: If d_M(y_i, current_mean) > k * sigma, ignore y_i.

curvature_bounds.check: Ensure manifold curvature remains within bounds to guarantee convexity of the objective function.
